front.title: Rapid acquisition of the MN multicast subscription after handover

abstract.t: A new proposal is presented for speeding up the acquisition by the MAG of the MN's active multicast subscription information, in order to accelerate the multicast delivery to the MN after a handover. To do that, an extension to the current PMIPv6 protocol is proposed. The solution described in this memo is not only applicable to the base solution for multicast support in PMIPv6, but also it can be applied to other solutions envisioned as possible architectural evolutions of it. Furthermore, it is also independent of the role played by the MAG within the multicast network (either acting as MLD proxy or multicast router).
